channel.title: unity on Donald Hutchison! Software Development!
channel.description: Recent content in unity on Donald Hutchison! Software Development!

item.title: Global Game Jam 2014
item.description: Last weekend was the Berlin Global Game Jam 2014. I'd made it part of a new years resolution plan to get more involved and release some games / projects, and this represented the first step towards doing something. My awesome team and I worked all weekend making a twin stick style shooter in Unity. This was my first experience with Unity, and as such I spent most of the time watching tutorials and desparately deciphering the mysteries of Unity's component / entity system.
